statements: SELECT * FROM InsuranceClaims ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_amount ASC
SELECT claim_id, policy_number FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE claim_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE policy_number LIKE 'PLN%'
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE policy_number = 'ABC123'
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount FROM InsuranceClaims
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_date, claim_amount FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE claim_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE policy_number LIKE 'P%'
SELECT claim_date, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM InsuranceClaims GROUP BY claim_date HAVING total_claim_amount > 10000
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM InsuranceClaims
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_date, claim_amount FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 AND policy_number IN ('P001', 'P002')
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM Insurance_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT company_name, count(*) AS total_claims FROM Insurance_Companies JOIN Claims ON Insurance_Companies.company_id = Claims.company_id GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM Insurance_Companies WHERE company_location = 'New York';
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM Insurance_Companies JOIN Claims ON Insurance_Companies.company_id = Claims.company_id GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT company_name, claim_date FROM Insurance_Companies JOIN Claims ON Insurance_Companies.company_id = Claims.company_id WHERE claim_amount > 10000 AND claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_description FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CoverageVerification WHERE verified_status = TRUE;
SELECT policy_number, verified_date FROM CoverageVerification WHERE verified_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_description FROM Claims WHERE policy_number = 12345;
SELECT policy_number, claim_date, count(*) FROM Claims GROUP BY policy_number, claim_date HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_description, p.payment_amount FROM Claims c JOIN Payments p ON c.claim_id = p.claim_id WHERE p.payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_description, v.verified_status FROM Claims c JOIN CoverageVerification v ON c.policy_number = v.policy_number WHERE v.verified_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_id, customer_id, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePolicy ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number, customer_id, effective_date FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date, status FROM Claim WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy ORDER BY effective_date DESC, coverage_amount ASC;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE coverage_amount >= 5000;
SELECT p.policy_number, c.claim_amount, v.verification_result FROM InsurancePolicy p, Claim c, CoverageVerification v WHERE p.policy_id = c.policy_id AND p.policy_id = v.policy_id;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) as avg_claim_amount FROM Claim;
SELECT * FROM Payment WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM Insurance_Companies WHERE company_id = 1
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, amount FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'admin'
SELECT coverage_type, deductable FROM Coverage
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies;
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM Insurance_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT claim_id, amount FROM Claims WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Coverage WHERE deductable <= 5000 AND company_id = 3;
SELECT Users.username, Claims.claim_date, Coverage.coverage_type FROM Users JOIN Claims ON Users.user_id = Claims.company_id JOIN Coverage ON Claims.company_id = Coverage.company_id;
